channel.title: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find
channel.description:
Before I upgraded my computer without backing up my mods, I had a really simple shoot and run mod for Half-Life 2. It started in a prison, with the G-Man standing right outside the door. He then turns around and walks up some stairs, and a scanner flies by, and all of a sudden the door falls in. Does anybody recognize this? I just can't for the life of me find it.
I might be meshing together a few mods, but I recall several other locations: the island (near the prison), some sewers (there might have been a driving sequence, but again, I might be mashing together other mods in my mind), a hotel/resort, and a train station.
If anybody else remembers this mod, please let me know.

item.title: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Thank you petifog and PlanetPhillip! I had just started working my way through PlanetPhillip’s archives (after several dozen other sites, each with… quite a number of mods. A large number that I am ashamed to have gone through.)

Thank you very much.

EDIT: Can’t find a download, on the official Offshore site or on Planet Phillip’s profile page.
EDIT: Nevermind, just not familiar with the site, I found the mirrors.

Read full topic

item.title: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
Try checking at PlanetPhillip forums, the main site has over a thousand mods (all single player, so no multiplayer crap to sort through) and there are at least a handful of people who have played all of them. Your description sounds relatively unique, so it might just trigger someone’s memory over there.

Read full topic
item.source: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find

item.title: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find
item.dc:creator: Stuntz
item.description:
Cannot say I am familiar with that mod… and I have played ALL the HL2 and HL mods, well that are on ModDB anyway… Do you have Synergy? Maybe it was a level off of that?

EDIT: Now that I think about it, that does sound familiar to me… Really familiar to me, and I think it WAS a Synergy map, here ill look it up for you man.

Here you go… https://www.dominionstudios.net/cms/content/syn_prison I hope that is it, because it sounds somewhat familiar to what you had.

Read full topic
item.source: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find

item.title: A Half-Life 2 Mod I Just Can't Find
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Nah, Provenance was the really cool Black Mesa placed one that doesn’t work anymore. But yeah, I thought that too until I downloaded it and remembered. Wait wait wait…

Wait, Providence?? THAT’S WHY I’ve been confusing it with that one… One second please…

EDIT: Hm, I can’t find a Providence, but for some reason, it just sounds right. Maybe the mod starts with a P or something…

Hey caleb, if you have that mod, could you send it to me somehow (post it somewhere, or PM me and I’ll give you an e-mail to send it to), just so I can find out?

Read full topic
